extendedInfo.description: Shimmering Moonlight is a Live Wallpaper.This live wallpaper auto rezise for all devices screen from 240x320 to tablet resolutionAlso you can set the speed of the live wallpaper in order to obtain the movement perfectly adapted to your phone model, Another useful feature is the ability to move the live wallpaper on the SD memory card. In this way, you can install on your phone all the Live Wallpaper that you want.Question & Answer:I have downloaded and installed it. How do I set it up as a Live Wallpaper?- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for " Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.Important:After you have installed and launched the live wallpaper, if you want to change the screen resolution:- Go to your home screen;- Press the menu button on your device;- Select "Wallpapers"- Select "Configure ....";- Select Set Size of Live Wallpaper:- Then click the back button on your Android device.System Requirement:There are two requirements to use live wallpaper:1) compatible hardware -- any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problems. HTC Droid Eris, Hero, Legend, Spica, and their cousins are known to have problems, even when updated to Android OS 2.X.2) compatible OS -- Android OS 2.1 (Eclair) or later can use live wallpapersWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and or home screen. This will help keep it free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app (Drag and Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from: Airpush Optout : http://www.airpush.com/optoutLeadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/  SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/Tags: Live Wallpapers Shimmering Moonlight Sea blue Palm tropical

reviews.title: Bad news...
reviews.comment: Warning, contains AirPush LeadBolt and Moolah Media. Only download if you want constant push message adds and don\'t value your privacy. Oh, and it\'s an ugly wallpaper too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting SPAM ADS now thanks to this...
reviews.comment: As of yesterday (1/11/12) I started getting notifications with a RED STAR next to them. I have now received 3 or 4.The last notification was \"LOOKING FOR A HOT DATE?\"  After researching this type of notification, that I have never had before, I found that it is (or is similar to) something called AirPush.   I downloaded AirPush Detector from the market which immediately identified THIS application.  I am deleting it as soon as I press ENTER on this review!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is just bad
reviews.comment: It its probably exactly the same code as every other live wallpaper from this author, just different images. The first one was bad, and this is a copy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: wait, what is this? Oh yeah, it\'s crap!

reviews.title: WARNING - ads, adware, multiple source ads, privacy concerns.
reviews.comment: All apps created by this party contain MULTIPLE sub-programs which target You, the innocent user, with ad generating programs.  If you install these apps on your device, you consent to many types of adverting including ads pushed to your notification bar, spam emails, ads when you browse, and many other forms of undesired advertising.  Additionally,  these type advertising companies typically share consumer information and be assured, your personal information will become public.    Fight spam, deception and scams... be cautious. I HIGHLY suggest you install one of many FREE, security and ad protection applications designed to stop spam - advertising programs. (SEARCH the android market for-free antivirus programs, free malware programs, free bloat ware and ad protection program. )   If we, the users, don\'t install these spam programs, the ad agencies, spam generating groups , and others, will not build them.  I have 30 plus years in advertising, sales and marketing ...believe me when I tell you that advertising groups monitor every ad channel.  If a channel is not profitable, you invest your ad budget elsewhere!  Let\'s get them where it hurts most...their ROI Return on Investment.
reviews.author: Bob P Wilson
